Fantastic!
DBeaver has now tip of the day functionality! Enjoy it!

You can execute current query using Ctrl+Enter shortcut.
Queries are separated by delimiters or empty lines.
You can just select any part of SQL script and run it with Ctrl+Enter
You can run SQL script using Alt+X shortcut. Script queries are separated with delimiters (like ; or go).
You can filter table rows by column value or using any SQL expression
